arcade.sim.checkpoint

Class Checkpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.sim.checkpoint.Checkpoint
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CellCheckpoint, GraphCheckpoint

    public abstract class Checkpoint
extends java.lang.Object
    A Checkpoint object saves and/or loads simulation checkpoints.

    Checkpoints do not save the entire simulation state; instead, it saves subsets that can then be loaded into simulations under different conditions. Checkpoints should (and can) only be loaded at the beginning of the simulation.

    Since:
    2.3
    Version:
    2.3.1
